verses.kjv: They that trust in the LORD shall be as mount Zion, which cannot be removed, but abideth for ever.
verses.ct: Those who put their trust in the LORD are like Mount Zion — it cannot be shaken and stands forever.

verses.kjv: As the mountains are round about Jerusalem, so the LORD is round about his people from henceforth even for ever.
verses.ct: Just as mountains surround Jerusalem, the LORD surrounds his people, now and for all time.

verses.kjv: For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; lest the righteous put forth their hands unto iniquity.
verses.ct: The rule of the wicked will not remain over the land given to the righteous, so that the righteous won't be driven to do evil themselves.

verses.kjv: Do good, O LORD, unto those that be good, and to them that are upright in their hearts.
verses.ct: LORD, treat good people well — those whose hearts are honest and true.

verses.kjv: As for such as turn aside unto their crooked ways, the LORD shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity: but peace shall be upon Israel.
verses.ct: But those who turn down dishonest paths — the LORD will drive them out along with all who practice evil. May peace rest on Israel.
